channel.desc: Whether its sports, esports, UCI, Ironman, F1, WRC, TV, music, festivals, films or videos, Red Bull TV has it all!

programme.title: Beneath the Surface
programme.desc: Big wave surfer Andrew Cotton risks his whole season on an unexplored piece of the Atlantic that could hold the biggest wave to ever be ridden. He travels to the middle of the ocean looking for the next big swell, but the ocean offers no guarantees.
programme.series-desc: Big wave surfer Andrew Cotton rolls the dice on his season by choosing to explore a wave with huge potential.

programme.title: Exploring Rio
programme.desc: Rio de Janeiro, Brazil, is an incredibly diverse city, filled with action and adventure. From climbing and ultrarunning to downhill mountain biking and surfing, what ties the city together is a love of sport and a deep sense of community.
programme.series-desc: Get a taste of the diverse action and adventure on offer in the neighbourhoods of Rio de Janeiro, Brazil.

programme.title: Race the Face
programme.sub-title: A giant slalom race in the Swiss Alps
programme.desc: One of the most accomplished freeriders and a former alpine skier, Jérémie Heitz, challenges Daron Rahlves for a head-to-head giant slalom race in big mountain terrain.
programme.series-desc: Jérémie Heitz challenges Daron Rahlves for a head-to-head giant slalom race in big mountain terrain.

programme.title: Archaic Festivals
programme.desc: This religious festival has been celebrated for 1,200 years, making it the oldest in Japan. Trees weighing as much as 9,000kg are brought from the mountains of Suwa to Shinto temples in a two-month celebration of unity, but it's not without danger.
programme.series-desc: An ancient celebration that brings renewed spiritual protection to Shinto temples is also a way of life.

programme.title: Frames of Mind
programme.sub-title: Inside the process with Matt Jones
programme.desc: Freerider Matt Jones visualises every detail of a trick before he puts it into action. Get a glimpse into what he sees when imagining these tricks as he shreds down the mountain with style.
programme.series-desc: Get a glimpse into how Matt Jones visualises every detail of a trick before he puts it into action.

programme.title: After the Raves
programme.desc: At the immersive experience of the Netherland's Mysteryland, DJ Tommie delves into the festival's history. Tommie enjoys the silent disco, before he hits the stage to perform for the first time.
programme.series-desc: DJ Tommie Sunshine delves into the history and culture of Mysteryland festival in the Netherlands.

programme.title: Fast Life
programme.desc: Leogang, Austria, is host to one of downhill mountain biking's most exciting races. It's a fast course that brings out the best in the competition, and race weekend tells a story filled with twists, turns, and always a surprise ending.
programme.series-desc: The story of race weekend in Leogang, Austria, is one filled with twists, turns, and always a surprise ending.

programme.title: Fast Life
programme.desc: The race in Vallnord, Andorra, is unique in that it has never seen the same rider win twice. As the tour moves to stop four, every racer in the UCI Downhill World Cup attempts to figure out the formula to not being a 'one-hit wonder'.
programme.series-desc: How hard is it to break the curse of a 'one-hit wonder'? Riders battle in Andorra in an attempt to double up.

programme.title: Ultimate Gasly
programme.desc: The simulator is a tool that enables Pierre Gasly to build his confidence with the track, hone his responses and get used to the car's settings. In the simulator Gasly can take more risks than he would on the track, which helps him prepare.
programme.series-desc: In the simulator Pierre Gasly can take more risks than he would on the track, which helps him prepare.

programme.title: Ultimate Gasly
programme.desc: Coming from a family with a love for motor sports, Pierre Gasly always knew he wanted to race. Hear from his parents as they reminisce about Gasly's young racing career. They knew their son was made to be a champion.
programme.series-desc: Coming from a family with a love for motor sports, Pierre Gasly always knew he wanted to race.

programme.title: Follow Your Nose
programme.sub-title: Two powder hounds on the hunt for epic snow
programme.desc: Gigi Rüf and Elias Elhardt share a passion for exploring the unknown. The journey to find new lines is as much a part of the soul of snowboarding as the turns themselves. Together, they create high-velocity art in the deep snow of the backcountry.
programme.series-desc: Snowboarders Gigi Rüf and Elias Elhardt leave search of unshredded pow in the backcountry.

programme.title: Ground Effect
programme.desc: A lot has changed since the last Mexican GP in 1992, and the track needs to be rebuilt to fulfill today’s FIA requirements. It's a race against time as millions of F1 fans worldwide are excited to see F1 Mexico come back to life.
programme.series-desc: After 23 years away, Formula One returns to Mexico City’s legendary Autódromo Hermanos Rodríguez track.

programme.title: Halo Effect
programme.desc: A crew of world-class kayakers heads to the whitewater meccas of Iceland and Norway in search of unexplored rapids. What they find is that the journey they planned is only half the adventure, and sometimes luck can change in the blink of an eye.
programme.series-desc: A group of the world's best kayakers journeys to Iceland and Norway in search of unexplored rapids to run.

programme.title: Miles Above
programme.desc: Scotty Bob Morgan and the BASE jumping team descend on Juneau, Alaska, home of team leader Jon Devore. Joined by backcountry legend JT Holmes, the boys have some high-flying fun over glaciers and the town.
programme.series-desc: Scotty Bob Morgan and the BASE jumping team take a trip to Juneau, Alaska, home of team leader Jon Devore.

programme.title: Miles Above
programme.desc: In the world of human flight, a 'boogie' is a gathering of like-minded pilots, simply to have a good old-fashioned throw down. With the help of a barge and a couple of helicopters the team gathered friends and family to rage on the crystal blue.
programme.series-desc: In the world of human flight, a 'boogie' is a gathering of like-minded pilots, simply to have a party.

programme.title: Mike Meets
programme.desc: Mike Chen meets Belgian World Rally Championship driver Thierry Neuville, who's finished runner-up in the WRC four times and is widely considered to be one of the most talented drivers the sport has ever seen.
programme.series-desc: Mike Chen meets four-time World Rally Championship runner-up Thierry Neuville.

programme.title: Hanging Spear
programme.desc: Join world class whitewater kayakers Steve Fisher and Pat Keller as they explore the Hanging Spear Gorge of the Opalescent River, the highest source of the Hudson and the deepest part of New York State’s High Peaks wilderness.
programme.series-desc: World class whitewater kayakers Steve Fisher and Pat Keller explore the Hanging Spear Gorge.

programme.title: Jovanotti & Baldini
programme.sub-title: Presented by Red Bull Studio Mobile
programme.desc: Superstar Italian singer/rapper Lorenzo Jovanotti teams up with renowned reggae producer Paolo Baldini to record a new song in the middle of the Tuscan countryside. It’s three days, two artists, one truck, and one brand-new single.
programme.series-desc: Italian singer/rapper Lorenzo Jovanotti teams up with reggae producer Paolo Baldini to create a new song.

programme.title: Asia Rising
programme.desc: With the help of record label 88rising, we look at six different artists from six different backgrounds, all within Asia, as they share their thoughts on the recent rise of hip-hop in the region.
programme.series-desc: Seen through the eyes of a diverse group, we take a look at the fast-paced success of Asian hip-hop.

programme.title: Buffalo Soldiers
programme.desc: MTB pro René Wildhaber recounts how his imagination was fired up when he first read about the Buffalo Soldier bikers, and how it led to his off-road biking-meets-USA-history project.
programme.series-desc: René Wildhaber recounts the Swiss origins of his imaginative off-road biking-meets-USA-history project.

programme.title: Buffalo Soldiers
programme.desc: MTB riders René Wildhaber and Ross Schnell begin their journey to discover the origins of the Buffalo Soldier bikers, and they quickly gain respect for what these men accomplished.
programme.series-desc: From campfires to old-school riding, René Wildhaber quickly gains respect for the Buffalo Soldier bikers.

programme.title: All Day SJ
programme.desc: Scotty James's career is hitting new heights after a big winter, but major success comes with major responsibility. Scotty is getting used to life as a celebrity beyond the snowboarding world.
programme.series-desc: Scotty James's career is hitting new heights after a big winter, but success comes with responsibility.

programme.title: All Day SJ
programme.desc: Scotty James and Pecky arrive in Switzerland ahead of the LAAX Open and set up a meeting with master halfpipe builder Jeremy Carpenter about building a pipe in Australia.
programme.series-desc: In Switzerland for the LAAX Open, Scotty James and Pecky meet up with halfpipe builder Jeremy Carpenter.

programme.title: Barista
programme.sub-title: The battle for the perfect cup is on
programme.desc: Enter the high-pressure world of competitive coffee creation with five contestants at the World Barista Championship. A craft that is both artistry and chemistry, but not always taken seriously, these baristas pursue this path out of pure passion.
programme.series-desc: Enter the high-pressure world of coffee creation with five contestants at the World Barista Championship.

programme.title: Faces of Dav
programme.desc: In 2007, Chris Davenport and Doug Coombs filmed a segment in Bella Coola, BC, Canada, for the movie Steep. Shortly after, Coombs passed away in a tragic ski accident. Seven years later, Chris returns to Bella Coola for a new adventure.
programme.series-desc: Chris Davenport returns to the Bella Coola mountain range, BC, Canada, for some adventure skiing.

programme.title: Faces of Dav
programme.desc: Pro skiers have a shelf life, but having an expert designing products for a company is invaluable. Chris Davenport travels to the headquarters of the companies he skis for and makes the equipment he'll use on his next trip.
programme.series-desc: To continue a career in the ski industry, Chris Davenport has to become more involved with the business side.

programme.title: Analog in Vienna
programme.desc: Host Prince Hubertus von Hohenlohe meets Albert Hammond Jr, guitarist from The Strokes rock band, in Vienna, Austria where Albert sets out to create an analog record, straight to vinyl live in one take. For more info check out: tinyurl.com/y7548ey4
programme.series-desc: Albert Hammond Jr, guitarist from The Strokes, heads to Austria to create an analog record in just one take.

programme.title: After the Raves
programme.desc: DJ Tommie Sunshine explores the symbiosis between EDM and technology in San Francisco, with artists such as DJ Chuckie, Hardkiss and The M Machine seamlessly weaving tech into their work.
programme.series-desc: In San Francisco, EDM blends technology and art for artists like DJ Chuckie, Hardkiss and The M Machine.

programme.title: Fast Life
programme.desc: With the UCI DH MTB World Cup season fast approaching, the top riders in both the men’s and women’s divisions get ready to prove that their off seasons were well spent. The time for talk is over. Riding fast is all that matters now.
programme.series-desc: As the UCI DH MTB World Cup season approaches, the time for talk is over. Riding fast is all that matters now.

programme.desc: At the immersive experience of the Netherland's Mysteryland, DJ Tommie delves into the festival's history. Tommie enjoys the silent disco, before he hits the stage to perform for the first time.

programme.title: Exploring Rio
programme.desc: Rio de Janeiro, Brazil, is an incredibly diverse city, filled with action and adventure. From climbing and ultrarunning to downhill mountain biking and surfing, what ties the city together is a love of sport and a deep sense of community.
programme.series-desc: Get a taste of the diverse action and adventure on offer in the neighbourhoods of Rio de Janeiro, Brazil.

programme.title: All Day SJ
programme.desc: Scotty James's career is hitting new heights after a big winter, but major success comes with major responsibility. Scotty is getting used to life as a celebrity beyond the snowboarding world.
programme.series-desc: Scotty James's career is hitting new heights after a big winter, but success comes with responsibility.

programme.title: Inside the Fourth Phase
programme.desc: The film-makers talk about the huge pressure they face to once again raise the bar of snowboard films. It's an undertaking that will take cutting edge technology, planning and guts.
programme.series-desc: The film-makers discuss the immense pressure to raise the bar on snowboard films while telling a good story.

programme.title: Fast Life
programme.desc: With the 2017 season kicking off in Lourdes, France, expectations are running high. But in DH mountain biking, the only certainty is that anything can happen. For Loïc Bruni and the rest of the sport's elite, this means taking nothing for granted.
programme.series-desc: In downhill mountain bike racing, the only certainty is that nothing is certain until the last rider's run.

programme.title: Fast Life
programme.desc: Fort William, Scotland, has been hosting DH World Cup events since 2002, and the long track always makes for electrifying racing. Leading up to the race in 2017, it's key to examine the factors that can make (and break) a winning streak.
programme.series-desc: Coming into the race in Fort William, Scotland, it's time to look at what makes (and breaks) winning streaks.

programme.title: Wreck or Get Rekt
programme.sub-title: A battle between video game rivals
programme.desc: Two video game rivals prepare to face off in a riveting head-to-head matchup. This exciting film merges the thrill of watching professional sports with the worldwide phenomenon of video games.
programme.series-desc: A couple of video game rivals get ready to face off in a head-to-head match.

programme.title: Travailen
programme.desc: At midnight on Monday, March 24, 2014, trailblazers Ryan Sandes and Ryno Griesel embarked on the ultimate Drakensberg adventure – the Drakensberg Grand Traverse – in an attempt to break the current record of 60h 29m.
programme.series-desc: Trailblazers Ryan Sandes and Ryno Griesel embarked on the ultimate Drakensberg adventure.

programme.title: Mates in Alaska
programme.desc: New Zealand's backcountry megastar Jake Koia is joined by Roland Morely-Brown on a journey to Haines, Alaska in search of perfect backcountry to ride. Luck is on their side, as they find perfect riding conditions on their first day out.
programme.series-desc: New Zealand snowboarders Jake Koia and Roland Morely-Brown take a dream trip to Haines, Alaska to snowboard.

programme.title: Mates in Alaska
programme.desc: Snowboarders Jake Koia and Roland Morley-Brown gear up for another epic bluebird day in Alaska's backcountry. After shredding some huge, picturesque lines, they decide the best way to follow that up is to shoot some high-powered guns with the locals.
programme.series-desc: Jake and Roland are blessed with a perfect day for snowboarding... and shooting guns with locals.

programme.title: McCaul Meets
programme.desc: Cam McCaul travels to Poland to meet up with Szymon Godziek and his family at home. Cam gets a guided tour around Szymon’s specially-designed, obstacle-laden MTB practice yard, and Szymon shares some thoughts about his sport and home life.
programme.series-desc: Cam McCaul meets up with Szymon Godziek at home in Poland and gets to ride at Szymon’s MTB practice yard.

programme.title: Ultimate Gasly
programme.desc: Get to know the people who surround Formula One driver Pierre Gasly, icluding his engineer and coach who help him through every race. Respect and trust are key in these relationships in order for them to be able to push Gasly to be the fastest.
programme.series-desc: Get to know the people who surround Formula One driver and GP2 champion Pierre Gasly.

programme.title: Ultimate Gasly
programme.desc: Formula One is a sport that requires well-rounded physical fitness from its pilots. Get a glimpse at the training routine Pierre Gasly's coach, Pyry, has him keeping to focus on retaining his energy.
programme.series-desc: Get a glimpse at the training routine Pierre Gasly's coach, Pyry, has him keeping.

programme.title: Ultimate Gasly
programme.desc: Take a look at the details that go into Pierre Gasly's Formula One suit. With weight being crucial the materials allow for the lightest weight possible while still being flame and heat resistant.
programme.series-desc: Take a look at the details that go into Pierre Gasly's Formula One suit.

programme.title: Inside the Fourth Phase
programme.desc: Travis Rice and the Brain Farm crew talk about the 20-year-old poem that set off their journey to make The Fourth Phase. Their goals are clear, but accomplishing them will test everyone involved.
programme.series-desc: Travis Rice and the Fourth Phase crew talk about the poetic spark that set the whole epic project in motion.

programme.title: Inside the Fourth Phase
programme.desc: The film-makers talk about the huge pressure they face to once again raise the bar of snowboard films. It's an undertaking that will take cutting edge technology, planning and guts.
programme.series-desc: The film-makers discuss the immense pressure to raise the bar on snowboard films while telling a good story.

programme.title: Ride: All In Red Bull Edition
programme.sub-title: The best dirt bike riders push to new heights
programme.desc: Watch some of the best dirt bike riders, including Jeffrey Herlings, Jorge Prado, Marvin Musquin and Cody Webb, push themselves to be fitter, stronger and faster in pursuit of the top step of the podium.
programme.series-desc: The best dirt bike riders from supercross, motocross, desert, FMX and endurocross push themselves to the top.

programme.title: Alptopia
programme.desc: After travelling the world for the past six years, skier Markus Eder has gained a lot of experience, learning from the professional skiers he skied with. But the more he travelled, the more he saw the treasure that hides in the Alps in Europe.
programme.series-desc: The more skier Markus Eder has travelled, the more he saw the treasure that hides in the Alps.

programme.title: Amazon High Tide
programme.desc: Big wave surfer Ramón Navarro is determined enough to cross the remote Amazon jungle in Brazil in search of a secret wave spot.
programme.series-desc: Ramón Navarro is a surfer brave enough to cross the Amazon jungle and find a secret wave spot.

programme.title: Life Behind Bars
programme.desc: In the woods of Canada’s British Columbia, Brandon Semenuk and his friends move into a cabin and turn the area into their riding playground. With a backyard decked out with dirt jumps and slopestyle courses, its a freeride mountain biking paradise.
programme.series-desc: In the woods of British Columbia, Canada, Brandon and his friends live in a freeride mountain biking paradise.

programme.title: Life Behind Bars
programme.desc: To escape the winter in Canada’s British Columbia, Brandon Semenuk and MTB pal Logan Peat hop into a Ford Mustang Mach 1 to road trip down the Pacific coast for an epic mountain bike session in Santa Cruz, California, USA.
programme.series-desc: Brandon Semenuk and Logan Peat drive down the coast in a Ford Mustang Mach 1 for an MTB session in California.

programme.title: Life Behind Bars
programme.desc: MTB riders Brandon Semenuk and Logan Peat head down to Tehachapi, California to test out the foam training facility at Woodward West. Afterward, they hit the outdoors for some freshwater fishing and skeet shooting.
programme.series-desc: In California, Brandon Semenuk and Logan Peat test out an indoor skate training course – including a foam pit.

programme.title: Away Days
programme.desc: The first full-length skate film from Adidas is an epic saga of life on the road. With a team featuring Mark Gonzales, Dennis Busenitz, Silas Baxter-Neal, Alec Majerus and more, this crew bring next-level skating to more than 100 cities worldwide.
programme.series-desc: Showcasing their superstar team, Adidas present a skateboarding saga, which was three years in the making.

programme.title: Imagine
programme.desc: Pushing limits isn’t about rolling the dice, but exploring the unknown while honouring the power of nature. These are the stories of extraordinary athletes who follow their passions to incredible new frontiers of imagination and self-discovery.
programme.series-desc: These are the stories about athletes exploring their passions while honouring the power of nature.

programme.title: Made In SE1
programme.desc: Up-and-coming big wave surfer Natxo González explores the Bizkaia region of his native Basque Country, home to one of the best left-hand waves in the world.
programme.series-desc: Natxo González explores the traditional sports that helped build the passion of Basque athletes.

programme.title: After the Raves
programme.desc: At the immersive experience of the Netherland's Mysteryland, DJ Tommie delves into the festival's history. Tommie enjoys the silent disco, before he hits the stage to perform for the first time.
programme.series-desc: DJ Tommie Sunshine delves into the history and culture of Mysteryland festival in the Netherlands.
